reviews.text:
I'm originally from Chicago and relocated to Burlington to study at one of the local colleges. Upon my first semester in school, Red Square welcomed me to be a resident DJ at their venue - which later turned into two residencies per week. Red Square has always been there for me and helped me advance in my DJ passion and my efforts to be a professional marketer.

The Red Square environment is fun and exciting! As a DJ, I always see our guests enjoying themselves and having a memorable time. There are multiple stages in the venue that DJs and live bands perform on throughout the week. That being said, Red Square is the place to be for an array of music.
Great drinks & staff.  Always a good time!  Nothing better then a summer night having drinks on their patio and listening to music!!

I'm giving this 3 stars as bring a bit of an older couple it seemed more of a dive bar. they had live music which was fun, a lounge area and a dance and DJ area in the back. it seemed a little different than what we are used to and being a big beer drinker we stopped in for a drink. My fiance said the shock top didnt taste like normal and my ipa left a dry aftertaste in my mouth. so I'm not sure if I'd be returning. it was clean inside and friendly staff just not sure if it's a place for me.

WAY BIGGER THAN IT LOOKS! Step inside to a small dining like area and step up to the dance floor. A DJ room in the back corner and live music outside in the summer time. Only downside is the bathroom situation, (especially for gents apparently) but other than that, an awesome place to hang with friends.

What fun night life! We were in the area for a wedding and stopped in for late night drinks. The band you had was very entertaining and we ended up staying for a couple hours. Dancing, drinking, socializing...Thanks for the experience

Great food, great service. Fluent English. Closes late, while most of the surrounding places are closed  already or reservation only.... super clean and the way they decorate the dishes is just beautiful.

Options galore--and everything is delicious. They have an English menu and don't be shy about flagging someone down to order. We ordered everything from the tempura brie, sushi bowl, salads and my favorite the sea-bream gills. Great place to duck into and feel like a local-- pub-like atmosphere with top shelf food and late night hours.
Great food and efficient-yet-friendly service at an affordable price.

Enjoyed every menu we ordered - karaagae, yakitori(thigh with green onion), cheese tempura, gyoza, potato salad and so on. I guarantee you’d never be disappointed with any menu in this izakaya. Its service was perfect, was not too loud, not too crowded, and price was reasonable. I and my sister were so satisfied with all aspects and would very love to revisit here if we can ! By that time, hopefully it will not get so famous that we have to wait for like hours lol. 
P.S. Its House White wine is awesome!
Favorite izakaya in Kyoto. Amazing food and sake. Try the sashimi, dumplings, yakatori, whole grilled onion and the cucumbers. So so good!
Very peaceful and interesting place to learn about a key figure that shaped Chinese culture. It is well worth having a wander around these beautiful gardens and taking it all in.
One of my favorite places to visit in Beijing. Easy to get to by subway. Beautiful place to stroll and learn history.
The temple is around the corner of 雍和宮. If you are keen to explore somewhere off the tourist path this is where you could visit.

Beautiful ancient temple, so inspirational and full of history, one of the most beautiful temples in Beijing and while China. Long queues for tickets , better to visit in early morning, leads crowded )) near the Lama Temple
Nice environment, good to see and read about the ancient historic scholars. Worth a visit if you have the time. Not difficult to get there by train and walk with GPS. Also near the Lama Temple.
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.
